welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Torre Santa Susanna, known for its stunning architecture and delicious cuisine! We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Papola Casale Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Papola Casale Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at M. A. Grottag Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at M. A. Grottag Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galatina Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
